title: 11/03/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 11/03/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Monday night was a great loss for the Giants

-The 49ers are done with Jimmy Garoppolo

-Colin defends Aaron Rodgers because the Packers are doing nothing for him

-Colin is done with Drew Lock because he danced and cares about being cool

-The Herd Hierarchy, Colin's top ten teams in the NFL (strangest one ever)


Guests: Ryen Russillo, The Ringer

Jay Glazer, FOX NFL Analyst


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
